original_text: The children fetch wood and their fathers use it to light a fire. The women prepare flour to cook cakes. Then they offer them to the “Queen of Heaven ”. And they offer gifts of drink to other false gods. They do that to make me angry.
korean_text: 자식들은 나무를 줍고 아버지들은 불을 피우며 부녀들은 가루를 반죽하여 하늘의 여왕을 위하여 과자를 만들며 그들이 또 다른 신들에게 전제를 부음으로 나의 노를 일으키느니라

sentences.original_text: and their fathers use it to light a fire
The women prepare flour to cook cakes
sentences.korean_translation: 여인들은 케이크를 굽기 위해 밀가루를 준비합니다

sentences.original_text: Then they offer them to the "Queen of Heaven"
And they offer gifts of drink to other false gods
sentences.korean_translation: 또 다른 거짓 신들에게 음료 선물을 바칩니다

sentences.original_text: They do that to make me angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나를 화나게 하기 위해 그렇게 합니다
